content: {"name": "Community Marketplace at Glenarden", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Stop by the registration desk and fill out the registration form, which asks for contact information, household information, and a few other details. Once that\u2019s finished, we\u2019ll give you a key card, just like the ones you get at a grocery store. Keep this key card and bring it to every Community Marketplace that you attend to enter the marketplace.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8615 McLain Avenue", "address_2": "Suite 1150", "city": "Glenarden", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20706", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9303056, "longitude": -76.8664208}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 506-4520", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
